botcomponent.description: This knowledge source contains Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for clinical laboratory tests whose names begin with letters L through O. Each document outlines protocols for specimen collection, test execution, quality control, and result reporting. Note: This knowledge source does not contain Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulatory documents, clearance letters, or device approval information. For FDA-related materials, please refer to the PathFinder FDA Documents agent and the appropriate FDA regulatory document knowledge sources and topics.
botcomponent.name: Lab Test Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs): L-O
